    • Field Detail

      • managerStates

        private static final java.lang.String[] managerStates
        Manager state abbreviation (each index is the corresponding state in integer). 4 chars max READ_PAPER = 0, ATTEND_CUSTOMER = 1, CALL_CUSTOMER = 2, FILL_STOCK = 3;

      • customerStates

        private static final java.lang.String[] customerStates
        Customer state abbreviation (each index is the corresponding state in integer). 3 chars max NORMAL_LIFE = 0, WAITING_REQUEST_REPAIR = 1, WAITING_REPLACEMENT_CAR = 2, GET_REPLACEMENT_CAR = 3, ATTENDED_W_SUBCAR = 4, ATTENDED_WO_SUBCAR = 5, ATTENDED = 6, ATTENDING = 7, CAR_FIXED = 8, GETTING_REPLACEMENT_CAR = 9, WAITING_ATTENDANCE = 10;

      • mechanicStates

        private static final java.lang.String[] mechanicStates
        Mechanic state abbreviation (each index is the corresponding state in integer). 3 chars max WAITING_FOR_WORK = 0, FIXING_THE_CAR = 1, CHECKING_STOCK = 2, ALERTING_MANAGER = 3;

        private java.io.File f
        File that the logger is going to write in

      • GeneralRepInformation

        public GeneralRepInformation(int numCustomers,
                             int numMechanics,
                             int numParts,
                             int[] carParts,
                             java.lang.String nameOfFile)
        Instantiation of GeneralRepInformation. Initialization of values to be updated
        Parameters:
        numCustomers - total number of Customers
        numMechanics - total number of Mechanics
        numParts - total number of Car Parts
        carParts - starting stock of Car Parts
        nameOfFile - name of the file where the log is going to be written in
